Module Chaos
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Experimental/Chaos/Public/Chaos/PBDCollisionSpringConstraintsBase.h
Include #include "Chaos/PBDCollisionSpringConstraintsBase.h"

Syntax

class FPBDCollisionSpringConstraintsBase

Remarks

This is an invertible spring class, typical springs are not invertible aware.
